Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Enacts the consulting act
Summary: Enacts the consulting act to regulate the activities of persons and organizations retained, employed or designated to influence the passage or defeat of state legislation, rules or regulations, or rate making proceedings or influence the passage or defeat of local laws, ordinances or regulations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to creating the consulting act
